text: Coach Andrew is very patient with my child who attended swimming class for the 1st time. And I am very thankful for the flexibility of no charges for missed or skip lessons especially when the child is unwell. Thank you coach Andrew üôè

My daughter enjoys her swimming lessons with Coach Andrew. Previously she was low in water confidence and was reluctant to get into the water. However, Coach Andrew was patient and assuring. Now, my daughter looks forward to swimming class every week.
My sons enjoy their lessons with Coach Andrew. He is patient and gentle with the kids, and motivates them to do better each time.
Coach is professional, responsive, and flexible. Teaches very well and doesn't charge for rainy days. My son thoroughly enjoys his lessons and looks forward to them every week.
Couch was very friendy and kind. My kid has a more timid temperment so i was initially worried but after just two lessons he cannot wait for his next lesson. Highly recommend.
